widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: 50-State Surveys. We worked on surveys on sex offender registration rules for the Criminal Law Center and consumer protection laws for the Consumer Protection Law Center.
Justia Legal Dictionary. We continued testing prompts for generating AI definitions of legal terms from various sources.

Justia Mexico Portal:
  • We included new pages for the Criminal Law Center on the Justia Mexico Portal. These pages cover topics on Medical Malpractice, Fraud, Human Trafficking, Abuse of Trust, and Interception of Private Communications. Each topic includes an Overview and a FAQ section and each section contains cross links to other Justia Mexico Portal content and external links to relevant laws, codes, and government sites.
  • Our team has updated the Commercial Codecenter, one of the most searched laws on our Portal.
  • We updated topics on the Alimony and National Registry of Alimony Obligations centers. This content has been cited as a source of consultation by the media and the Mexican Congress.
